      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A model of gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Modell der Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un modèle des gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um modelo dos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un modello dei gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μοντέλο των αερίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un modelo de gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a model of a gas using metal balls and a vibrating container.  The particles of gas are moving about in all directions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal balls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Model</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Modell eines Gases mit 
Metallkugeln und einem vibrierenden Behälter. Die Partikel des 
Gases bewegen ungefähr in alle Richtungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un modèle d'un gaz à 
l'aide des boules en métal et d'un récipient vibrant. Les 
particules du gaz se déplacent environ toutes les directions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um modelo de um gás 
usando esferas do metal e um recipiente vibrando. As partículas
do gás estão movendo-se aproximadamente em todos os sentidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un modello di un gas 
per mezzo delle sfere del metallo e di un contenitore di vibrazione. 
Le particelle di gas stanno muovendosi circa in tutti i sensi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα μοντέλο σφαιρών των 
αέριο χρησιμοποιώντας μετάλλων και ενός δομένος 
εμπορευματοκιβωτίου. Τα μόρια αέριο τριγυρνούν σε όλες 
τις κατευθύνσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un modelo de un gas 
usando bolas del metal y un envase que vibra. Las partículas 
del gas se están moviendo alrededor en todas las direcciones.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Gaspartikel</string>
